---
order: -2
title: 表单联动
subtitle: Watch & Show
---

支持监听表单值的变化，支持显示隐藏

```jsx
import {
  FormInputField,
  Notify,
  FormRadioGroupField,
  Radio,
  BlockHeader,
  FormSelectField,
  ISelectProps,
  Button
} from 'zent';
import { EasyForm } from '@youzan/ebiz-components';
import { ZentForm } from 'zent/es/form/ZentForm';
import { moneyRange, intRange } from '../validators';
import { IFormCreatorConfig } from '../types';

const config: IFormCreatorConfig[] = [
  {
    component: <BlockHeader title="show的用法" />
  },
  {
    name: 'limit',
    label: '是否限购：',
    type: 'field',
    component: FormRadioGroupField,
    defaultValue: 0,
    children: [
      {
        component: (
          <>
            <Radio value={1}>限购</Radio>
            <Radio value={0}>不限购</Radio>
          </>
        )
      }
    ],
  },
  {
    name: 'limitNum',
    label: '限购数量：',
    type: 'field',
    required: true,
    component: FormInputField,
    validators: [
      intRange({
        min: 1,
        max: 9999
      })
    ],
    show: {
      dep: 'limit',
      fn: (limit: number) => limit === 1,
    }
  },
  {
    component: <BlockHeader title="支持promise的show" />
  },
  {
    name: 'type',
    label: '类型：',
    type: 'field',
    component: FormSelectField,
    props() {
      return {
        props: {
          data: [
            { value: 1, text: '用户类型A' },
            { value: 2, text: '用户类型B' },
          ],
        } as ISelectProps
      }
    },
    helpDesc: 'ajax请求之后才知道是不是有用户名的用户',
  },
  {
    name: 'username',
    label: '用户名：',
    type: 'field',
    component: FormInputField,
    show: {
      dep: 'type',
      fn: type => {
        return new Promise(resolve => {
          setTimeout(() => {
            resolve(type === 1);
          }, 1000);
        });
      }
    }
  },
  {
    component: <BlockHeader title="watch的用法" />
  },
  {
    name: 'price',
    label: '买家价格：',
    type: 'field',
    component: FormInputField,
    validators: [
      moneyRange({
        min: 1,
        max: 100
      })
    ]
  },
  {
    name: 'originPrice',
    label: '原价格：',
    type: 'field',
    component: FormInputField,
    validators: [
      moneyRange({
        min: 1,
        max: 100
      })
    ],
    helpDesc: '原价格是买家价格的2倍',
    watch: [
      {
      dep: 'price',
        fn: (price: number, form: ZentForm<any>) => {
          if (price) {
            form.patchValue({
              originPrice: price * 2
            });
          }
        },
      }
    ]
  },
];

function Form() {
  const onSubmit = (ctx: ZentForm<any>) => {
    const values = JSON.stringify(ctx.getValue());
    Notify.success(values);
  };
  return (
    <EasyForm layout="horizontal" config={config} onSubmit={onSubmit}>
      <div className="zent-form-actions">
				<Button type="primary" htmlType="submit"> 保存 </Button>
			</div>
    </EasyForm>
  );
}

ReactDOM.render(<Form />, mountNode);
```
